articles.title: Landlord imprisoned for decades in hate-crime attack on Palestinian American family has died - AP News
articles.description: A landlord who was sentenced to decades in prison for killing a Palestinian American boy and wounding his mother has died. Joseph Czuba was imprisoned three months ago for 53 years behind bars. He was found guilty in February of murder, attempted murder and h…
articles.content:
JOLIET, Ill. (AP) A landlord sentenced to decades in prison after he killed a Palestinian American boy and wounded his mother has died. 
Three months ago, Joseph Czuba was sentenced to 53 years behi… [+2069 chars]
